keyPoints: Demonstrated efficacy in preventing symptomatic COVID-19 and severe disease
Administered in two doses
Easier storage and transport at regular refrigerator temperatures
Widely used in global vaccination efforts
sideEffects: Common: Pain at the injection site, fatigue, headache, muscle pain, chills, fever, nausea
regulatoryApproval: Received regulatory approvals in various countries and authorized for emergency use

keyPoints: High efficacy in preventing symptomatic COVID-19 and severe disease
Administered in two doses, typically three weeks apart
Requires ultra-cold storage (-70°C or -94°F) for long-term storage
Widely used in global vaccination campaigns
sideEffects: Common: Pain at the injection site, fatigue, headache, muscle pain, chills, fever
regulatoryApproval: Received regulatory approvals in various countries and authorized for emergency use

keyPoints: Developed using inactivated virus technology
Demonstrated efficacy in preventing symptomatic COVID-19
Administered in two doses
Stable at standard refrigeration temperatures
sideEffects: Common: Pain at the injection site, mild fever, fatigue
regulatoryApproval: Received regulatory approvals in various countries and authorized for emergency use

regulatoryApproval: Received regulatory approvals in various countries and authorized for emergency use
